name: Which Way Out
description:
Which Way Out is a beautiful Physics Puzzle Plat-former full of illusions and deceit, what is real? and what is fake? what is there and what is not?.
With a level designs that will make you think as well as test your skill at slight of hand. you will need patience and a curious mind to pass the many chambers, can you find your way out?


  • Includes 20 stunning levels.
  • levels get darker through each stage.
  • includes a fun character slingshot movement system.
  • levels consist of fake walls, invisible walls, spikes, breakable walls, fake spikes and many more to confuse and test your patience to see if you can find the way out.
Abilities.
There are 3 main abilities to help you out!
  • Clone: Launch a Clone in the desired direction to see whats real or fake, to see what will kill you and what wont. or to find possible secret areas.
  • Light Bullet: Launch a Light Bullet in the desired direction to see what lies ahead, as the game gets very dark in some parts.
  • Pause Player only: This will stop the player in mid air or where ever you are in the level so you may stop yourself from dying or use the abilities above in a more controlled manner.



Can you find your way out?.
